item.description:
That's right. Tom's in town and let's take him to a real diner for some good old fashioned bacon and eggs.
Tom needs us to push him out in Goodspeed. But I don't think they have a breakfast place.
So, lets go to KIJD, Willimantic Ct. Short hop, but a fun one.

From there, one or all of us, needs to bring him to his folks near KMMK, Goodspeed Ct. and dump him off. Then he's their problem (again)!

I will vote for Tom for the next EAA President!

Be there or be square... Just be there.

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Bacon and Eggs at the AeroDiner with EAA's own Tom Charpentier!
